author: andschwa
body:
- [x] Syntax coloring
- [x] Simple syntax error notification
- [x] A good multi-line experience (both editing and history)
- [x] Customizable key bindings
- [x] Cmd and emacs modes (neither are fully implemented yet, but both are usable)
- [ ] Many configuration options
- [x] Bash style completion (optional in Cmd mode, default in Emacs mode)
- [x] Bash/zsh style interactive history search (CTRL-R)
- [x] Emacs yank/kill ring
- [x] PowerShell token based "word" movement and kill
- [x] Undo/redo
- [x] Automatic saving of history, including sharing history across live sessions
- [ ] "Menu" completion (somewhat like Intellisense, select completion with arrows) via Ctrl+Space

comments.author: andschwa
comments.body: Next step: update list with known-working, then figure out MVP.
